nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to our Medical Appointment System! How can I assist you today?

nodes.label: select_speciality
utterances: Which specialist would you like to see: Dr. Rogers (General Practitioner), Dr. Williams (Cardiologist), or Dr. Chen (Neurologist)?

nodes.label: show_doctors_gp
utterances: Dr. Rogers is available on Monday and Wednesday (9AM-5PM). Would you like to schedule with Dr. Rogers?

nodes.label: show_times_rogers_mon
utterances: Dr. Rogers has the following slots available on Monday: 9:15 AM, 10:30 AM, or 2:45 PM. Which time would you prefer?

nodes.label: confirm_details
utterances: You're scheduled with Dr. Rogers on Monday at 9:15 AM. Would you like to confirm this appointment?

nodes.label: get_patient_info
utterances: Please provide your full name and phone number for your Monday 9:15 AM appointment with Dr. Rogers.

nodes.label: appointment_confirmed
utterances: Your appointment with Dr. Rogers on Monday at 9:15 AM has been confirmed. A reminder will be sent via SMS. Is there anything else you need help with?

nodes.label: end
utterances: Thank you for using our service! We look forward to seeing you on Monday at 9:15 AM with Dr. Rogers.
I'd like to schedule an appointment
I need to see a General Practitioner
Yes, I'd like to schedule with Dr. Rogers
No, I need a different time
No, I'd like to see Dr. Rogers on a different day
No, I need a different specialist
